main event: A sighting of an object resembling a moving star was reported in Elmont, New York, on July 29, 1959.
interesting points: The object appeared to move slower than a plane,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes,Weather conditions were clear during the observation,The object moved off rapidly in a west-northwest direction and disappeared from view,The initial assumption was that the object was a satellite, due to its bright appearance.
sighted object: an object resembling a moving star
witness description: A person walking along the sidewalk on Milton Ave in Elmont.
